messages.subject: Q2 Deliverable Assignments
messages.body:
Hi team,

As we plan for Q2, I've outlined the deliverables and assigned tasks accordingly. Alice, please lead the market analysis report with a preliminary draft by April 20. Bob, coordinate with the design team to finalize the new UI mockups by April 25. We will have a review meeting on April 27 to discuss progress and next steps.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks,
Manager

messages.subject: Re: Q2 Deliverable Assignments
messages.body:
Hi Manager,

I've started working on the market analysis and will share the draft by April 20 as requested.

Best,
Alice

messages.subject: Re: Q2 Deliverable Assignments
messages.body:
Manager,

I will reach out to the design team today and aim to have the UI mockups ready before the deadline.

Regards,
Bob

messages.subject: Re: Q2 Deliverable Assignments
messages.body:
Thanks for the quick responses. Please ensure all feedback is consolidated by April 23. I'll send out the meeting invitation for April 27 shortly.

Cheers,
Manager

key_points: Set deadlines for market analysis and UI mockups
